tests.description_html: An empty RNA sequence should result in an empty protein list.
tests.name: Empty RNA sequence

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'AUG' should translate to 'Methionine'.
tests.name: Methionine RNA sequence

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUU' should translate to 'Phenylalanine'.
tests.name: Phenylalanine RNA sequence 1

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUC' should translate to 'Phenylalanine'.
tests.name: Phenylalanine RNA sequence 2

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUA' should translate to 'Leucine'.
tests.name: Leucine RNA sequence 1

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUG' should translate to 'Leucine'.
tests.name: Leucine RNA sequence 2

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUUUUU' should translate to ['Phenylalanine', 'Phenylalanine'].
tests.name: Sequence of two protein codons

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'UUAUUG' should translate to ['Leucine', 'Leucine'].
tests.name: Sequence of two different protein codons

tests.description_html: The RNA sequence 'AUGUUUUGG' should translate to ['Methionine', 'Phenylalanine', 'Tryptophan'].
tests.name: Sequence of three proteins

tests.description_html: Translation should stop if a stop codon is at the beginning of the sequence.
tests.name: Stop codon at start

tests.description_html: Translation should stop if a stop codon is at the end of the sequence.
tests.name: Stop codon at end

tests.description_html: Translation should stop if a stop codon is in the middle of the sequence.
tests.name: Stop codon in middle
